item.title: Personally Defined Rules For Learning With AI
item.description: [[Digital-Cottage/Thoughts And Mental Snippets/Thoughts And Mental Snippets|Thoughts And Mental Snippets]] Fundamentally, AI should be used as a first-point substitution for scanning of documentation, rubber ducky-ing as well as a tool to reduce start-up friction to tasks â€” but rarely as a tool for bridging gaps in logic ability.
